short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A filtering system for Facebook users that removes content containing custom defined subjects and keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: content warning is a free Chrome Extension that removes/hides content on Facebook that may be sensitive or triggering to people based on their needs.
